p: The incidence of HFMD in all age groups in mainland China from 2009 to 2014 were 86.59/100000, 132.35/100000, 120.21/100000, 160.17/100000, 134.37/100000, and 203.16/100000, respectively [ 12]. According to the communicable disease surveillance system of Guangdong Province, China, the numbers of reported cases of HFMD from 2008 to 2013 were 48917, 93067, 226622, 274006, 330621 and 358068, respectively [ 13].
